com.risk.team.controller

Class RiskTournamentController

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • com.risk.team.controller.RiskTournamentController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class RiskTournamentController
extends java.util.Observable
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    This class provides all the methods to control various activities during the game play, implements Observer.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Kartika Patil
